#summary An example of how to use the API in a novel Python program

= Introduction =

The example here goes through in creating a visualization for [Gephi http://gephi.org/] of a RDF class structure and the relations between these classes.

= Details =

The source for this example is in the program []

We import the pyTripleSimple into pyt namespace and the GephiGexf xml
generator class.
{{{
import pyTripleSimple as pyt
from gexf import GephiGexf
}}}
